info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Powell County through 530 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garrison, or 9 miles north of Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Garrison, Finn, Brock Creek, Blossburg, Avon and Elliston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 169 and 186. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
